backend/main.mo: Actor managing certificate storage and course enrollments with add/remove/verify certificate functions and per-caller enrollment tracking.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence listing required article updates and image additions tied to specific frontend files and test IDs.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries describing responsibilities of various frontend components, pages, data modules, and utilities.
frontend/DEPLOYMENT_TROUBLESHOOTING.md: Guide explaining causes of deployment failures and detailing added build configs and scripts for fixing them.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind-based global stylesheet defining light/dark theme CSS variables and applying base styles.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point setting metadata, icons, root element, and loading the main frontend script.
frontend/scripts/deploy-runner.ts: Node deployment orchestrator running build steps with retries, logging, secret redaction, and structured reporting.
frontend/scripts/retry.ts: Utility implementing retry logic with exponential backoff and detailed logging for failing operations.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React app configuring layout, theme, query client, and full route tree for all site pages.
frontend/src/components/HeroCodeLines.ts: Displays decorative animated code lines for the hero section using styled divs and spans.
frontend/src/components/ScrollToTopOnRou: Subscribes to router navigation events and scrolls the window to the top after each route change.
frontend/src/components/SiteFooter.tsx: Renders the website footer with brand info, quick links, legal links, and social media icons, including scroll-to-top behavior for same-route clicks.
frontend/src/components/SiteHeader.tsx: Implements a responsive site header with navigation links, logo, and a mobile menu with scroll-to-top logic.
frontend/src/components/TextImageCarouse: Provides an accessible image-and-text carousel with autoplay, keyboard navigation, and manual controls.
Shows a top contact bar with a promo message, email, phone, and social icons.
frontend/src/data/articles.ts: Defines the Article interface and exports an array of article objects with metadata and full content.
frontend/src/data/courses.ts: Defines the Course interface and exports a list of course metadata including descriptions, icons, and pricing.
frontend/src/data/galleryImages.ts: Defines a GalleryImage interface and exports a list of categorized image metadata for use across the UI.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor based on user identity and refreshes dependent queries when the actor changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides context and hooks to manage Internet Identity authentication, including login, logout, and identity persistence.
frontend/src/hooks/usePrefersReducedMoti: Detects the user's reduced‑motion preference using a media query and updates on changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Provides course enrollment queries and mutations using React Query and the backend actor.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind layers and custom cybersecurity‑themed CSS variables, components, and utilities for styling.
frontend/src/lib/currency.ts: Exports a helper to format numbers as INR currency strings.
frontend/src/lib/validation.ts: Contains simple validation helpers for required fields and email format checking.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Initializes the React app with QueryClient and InternetIdentityProvider wrappers.
frontend/src/pages/AboutPage.tsx: Renders the About page with mission content, a carousel, values list, testimonials, and story section.
frontend/src/pages/ArticleDetailPage.tsx: Displays a full article based on slug and handles missing articles with a fallback UI.
frontend/src/pages/ArticlesPage.tsx: Shows a grid of article cards with metadata and navigation to individual article pages.
frontend/src/pages/CertificateVerificati: Certificate verification form that calls an actor method to validate a certificate ID and displays success or failure states.
frontend/src/pages/ContactPage.tsx: Contact form with validation and localStorage-backed submission plus social links display.
frontend/src/pages/CourseDetailPage.tsx: Course detail and enrollment page with payment simulation, identity checks, and enrollment mutation handling.
frontend/src/pages/CoursesPage.tsx: Lists all available courses with images, details, and navigation to each course’s detail page.
frontend/src/pages/EnrollmentSuccessPage: Displays enrollment confirmation with course info, amount paid, and navigation options.
frontend/src/pages/GalleryPage.tsx: Shows a gallery grid of training-related images with hover effects.
frontend/src/pages/HomePage.tsx: Main landing page displaying hero content, featured courses, tool categories, and a rotating image carousel with navigation buttons.
frontend/src/pages/PrivacyPage.tsx: Renders the site's privacy policy using card sections outlining data collection, usage, security, and user rights.
frontend/src/pages/ResourcesPage.tsx: Lists categorized cybersecurity resources with icons and descriptions, plus a responsible‑use notice.
frontend/src/pages/TermsPage.tsx: Displays terms and conditions in card sections covering service use, conduct, liability, and IP rights.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration extending theme colors, animations, containers, and enabling plugins for typography, container queries, and animations.
frontend/tsconfig.node.json: TypeScript config for Node‑side tools enabling ESNext modules, bundler resolution, and including vite.config.ts.
frontend/vite.config.ts: Vite setup with React, env variable plugins, path aliasing, build chunking, dev server proxying, and dependency optimization.
project_state.json: Contains high-level project state, architectural notes for the ICP dapp’s React/Motoko setup, known deployment issues, and metadata for all generated image assets.
